examples.example: 从这一孔小小的窗户望出去，却能看到无比美丽的风景。

translate.english: Looking out from this small window, one can see extremely beautiful scenery.

examples.example: 他透过一孔小小的缝隙，看到了外面精彩的世界。

translate.english: He saw the wonderful world outside through a small crack.

examples.example: 那古老的墙壁上有一孔窑洞，仿佛在诉说着过去的故事。

translate.english: There is a cave dwelling on that ancient wall, as if telling the stories of the past.
